game.name: Backpack Battles
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: PvP 인벤토리 관리 오토배틀러! 강력한 아이템을 구매 및 제작하고, 배낭에서 신중하게 배치하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A PvP inventory management auto battler! Buy and craft powerful items, then carefully arrange them in your backpack.

reviewHighlights.text: Game itself is nice, fun for the time when you have no other things to do. Downside of it are the devs that are overly sensitive. If you say that in y...
Addictive & poorly balanced. Fun until platinum-rank & then the rank-clamping kicks in. Winning isn't good enough anymore, you have to dominate, usual...
